description: Discharge of Conditions 3 (Materials), 6 (Cycling), 17 (Landscaping) and 19 (Fire Escape) of planning application 15/12466/FUL (Variation of Condition 2 of Planning Permission 05/12214/FUL (Erection of "boathouse" building (821m2) over the Barge Dock for use as a restaurant/cafe on first floor with ground floor reception, plant room and alterations to mooring facilities) dated 03/09/2015
decision_conditions: Due to the insufficient information submitted regarding the proposed materials in relation to Conditions 3 (Materials) of planning permission 15/12466/FUL, the the proposals are considered not to ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

Due to the insufficient information submitted regarding the proposed boundary treatment, the information submitted in relation to Condition 17 (Landscaping, Boundary Details and Mooring Fixtures) of planning permission 15/12466/FUL are considered not to ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

A plan identifying the location of refuse and recycling storage has been submitted to discharge condition 7 of planning permission 21/02420/FUL.No refuse enclosures are proposed but this is consistent with the existing arrangements for the dental surgery and upper floor residential uses (which do not form part of this proposal). The refuse bins will be stored in a convenient location and the details submitted are deemed acceptable.

A sound insultation assessment has been submitted to discharge condition 8 of planning permission 21/02420/FUL.This includes a predicted noise assessment of the use of the premises to determine the impact on the upper floor residential flats. The assessment concludes that the relevant target noise levels would be achieved (without any mitigation being required) to avoid an undue impact on these neighbours. The Council's Pollution Control Officer has reviewed the report and is satisfied to discharge this condition.
No drawings have been received as part of this application. As a minimum, a sit location plan is required. Please provide a site location plan and any drawings pertaining to the proposal.

Good afternoon Julie,We are currently unable to validate your application as you haven't provided the amounts in meters:T3965 Robinia - Repollard to previous points removing how much regrowth?T0180 Yew - Crown Lift to 2.5m over footpath.And the application should ideally be supported by photos of the trees as they currently exist.Please provide this information by responding to this email as promptly as possible so that we can resume the validation process.
